Title: Advance under the banner of Mao Zedong!
Publisher: Nanjing People's Meeting for the Commemoration of the Twelfth Anniversary of the "July the Seventh" War of Resistance and the Third Anniversary of the People's Liberation War (南京市人民庆祝南？杭及广大地区解放、纪念‘七七’抗战十二周年、纪念人民解放战争三周年大会)
Notes: Later, multi-colored versions of this poster exist with the Qianmen city gate, Beijing, in the left background, and a National flag or a Party flag behind Mao's profile.
